dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper introduces current and future information technology tools for health care with a focus on perinatal and women s health areas of nursing The technologies include personal digital assistants wireless computing smart cards biometrics and storage cards Strategies to incorporate these applications into practice are discussed
Journal of obstetric, gynecologic, and neonatal nursing : JOGNN / NAACOG
Personal digital assistants, wireless computing, smart cards, and biometrics: a hardware update for clinical practice.
